name: 06 - Archive a channel
precondition: A channel must already have been created in a known team.

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P4 - Low-Impact (Edge or unsuitable to repeat?)

inline.description:
1. Have admin view My New Private Channel.
  2. Run `./mattermost channel archive ateam:mynewprivatechannel`
inline.expectedResult:
1. admin refreshes and is viewing Town Square; archived channel is not in LHS 
  2. Running `./mattermost channel list ateam` should show mynewprivatechannel (archived) (private) 
  3. In some tests channel has archive icon in LHS, message box is disabled, "You are viewing an archived channel. New messages cannot be posted." appears

customFields.Important notes about this step: Channel disappears on refresh. Ticket for mobile failure - https://mattermost.atlassian.net/browse/MM-19961
